meanings.definition: A person who makes a request.
meanings.sent1: The requesters asked politely for help.
meanings.sent2: The requesters submitted their demands to the authorities.
meanings.sent3: The requesters decided to ask for a unicorn as a joke.
meanings.sent4: The requesters were like bees buzzing around for assistance.
meanings.sent5: The requesters were like messengers delivering wishes to the genie.

meanings.sent1: The requesters gathered to discuss their demands.
meanings.sent2: The requesters were waiting in line to make their requests.
meanings.sent3: The requesters formed a club to ask for more cookies.
meanings.sent4: The requesters were a flock of birds chirping for attention.
meanings.sent5: The requesters were a team of agents seeking answers from the oracle.
